AlicesGrimoire.NAME: Alice's Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yGenerate a random #yDoll.

SuspiciousCard.NAME: Suspicious Card
SuspiciousCard.FLAVOR: A card with a Shanghai Doll on it. Where did Marisa get this from?
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yGenerate a #yShanghai #yDoll.

AlicesDarkGrimoire.NAME: Alice's Dark Grimoire
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, #yGenerate 3 random #yDolls.

ColorContacts.NAME: Color Contacts
ColorContacts.FLAVOR: "I will never weary of gazing into your eyes, though they had no longer a ray of recognition for me."
DESCRIPTIONS: At the first #b2 turns of each combat, gain [E] and draw #b1 card.
